title: I NEED SOME RP PLEASE
body: Can i gets some rp because i need to purches project ekko and i only playes ekko most. riot can u help me till now i only have 10 rp please roit help me..

replies.body:
We may be able to work something out if you reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
